ComicInfo.Title: Notes #29; Ticked Off; Bye-Bye Daddy; Our Miss Ruby
ComicInfo.Summary:
Midge has conflicting feelings about Chuck; Marcie is horribly stressed about the Lord. David, who turns out to be the new package-delivery guy, sees Marcie at work and she panics. Sylvia brings up Y2K concerns at work, and Midge begins to think that it wouldn't be so bad to have Chuck around when the whole world crashes.
A trip to California to visit her mother and her father (who has Alzheimer's)
Ruby's day in the nursing home
